sql.if: ${accountName.operation} (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_crm_account WHERE m_crm_account.accountName like '%${accountName.value}%' AND m_crm_account.id=m_crm_contract.accountid) > 0

${opportunityName.operation} (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_crm_opportunity WHERE m_crm_opportunity.opportunityName like '%${opportunityName.value}%' AND m_crm_opportunity.id=m_crm_contract.opportunityid) > 0

${assignUserName.operation} (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM s_user WHERE m_crm_contract.assignUser = s_user.username AND (LTRIM(concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname)) like '%${assignUserName.value}%') ) > 0

mapper.sql:
SELECT m_crm_contract.id, m_crm_contract.contractname, m_crm_contract.status, m_crm_contract.code, m_crm_contract.accountid, m_crm_contract.opportunityid, m_crm_contract.currencyid, m_crm_contract.assignUser, m_crm_contract.customersigneddate, m_crm_contract.companysigneddate, m_crm_contract.type, m_crm_contract.description, m_crm_account.accountName, m_crm_opportunity.opportunityName, m_crm_contract.startdate, m_crm_contract.enddate, m_crm_contract.contractvalue, LTRIM(concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname)) as assignUserFullName, m_crm_contract.createdTime, m_crm_contract.createdUser, m_crm_contract.lastUpdatedTime
FROM m_crm_contract LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_account ON (m_crm_contract.accountid = m_crm_account.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_opportunity ON (m_crm_contract.opportunityid = m_crm_opportunity.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON (m_crm_contract.assignUser = s_user.username)
